items.sentence: Didn\'t you know Tom and I had to do that alone?
Please make sure you get to the station on time.
Please take off your shoes before coming inside.
Don\'t you want to hear what Tom said about you?
Tom told me that Mary used to be his girlfriend.
Tom certainly did everything we asked him to do.
Tom certainly does a good job cleaning chimneys.
Tom vowed never to set foot in that place again.
I\'m certain Tom will do what he says he\'ll do.
I don\'t think that Tom really plans to do that.
I don\'t think that Tom will be able to do that.
I don\'t think you should borrow money from Tom.
Tom wasn't the only one who knew how to do that.
Tom's ex-wife and Mary's ex-husband got married.
Tom's love of the outdoors isn't shared by Mary.
You can tell by Tom's accent that he's Canadian.
You don't seem to be as calm as Tom seems to be.
You don't seem to be as conscientious as Tom is.
Tom warned Mary that that would probably happen.
Tom was the last student to leave the classroom.
